detectors.description:
TestSpell.schedule() (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/TestSpell.sol#64-69) uses timestamp for comparisons
	Dangerous comparisons:
	- require(bool,string)(now <= expiration,This contract has expired) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/TestSpell.sol#65)
	- require(bool,string)(eta == 0,This spell has already been scheduled) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/TestSpell.sol#66)
